    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Returns the description of the task
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the ID of a given task
      java.lang.String getProvider()
      Returns the string name of the user who will complete the task
      java.lang.String getRequester()
      Returns the requester of a particular task.
      java.lang.String getStatus()
      Returns the current status of the task.
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Returns the title of the task
      void setAssigned()
      Sets the status of a task to "Assigned", which indicates that a user has bidded on the task and the task requester has accepted said user's bid.
      void setBidded()
      Sets the status of a task to "Bidded", which indicates that one or more user has placed a bid on the task, but the requester has not yet accepted a bid.
      void setDescription(java.lang.String newDescription)
      Sets the description of a task to the string provided by the user
      void setDone()
      Sets the status of a task to "Done", which indicates that the task has been completed.
      void setId(java.lang.String newId)
      This function sets a new ID for a given task.
      void setProvider(java.lang.String provider)
      Sets the provider for a given task
      void setRequested()
      Sets the status of a task to "Requested", which indicates that a task has been posted to the app and there are no bids placed on it.
      void setTitle(java.lang.String newTitle)
      Sets the title of the task to the string provided by the user

        Sets the description of a task to the string provided by the user
        Parameters:
        newDescription - a string representing the description

      • setBidded

        public void setBidded()
        Sets the status of a task to "Bidded", which indicates that one or more user has placed a bid on the task, but the requester has not yet accepted a bid.

      • setRequested

        public void setRequested()
        Sets the status of a task to "Requested", which indicates that a task has been posted to the app and there are no bids placed on it.

      • setAssigned

        public void setAssigned()
        Sets the status of a task to "Assigned", which indicates that a user has bidded on the task and the task requester has accepted said user's bid. The status of "Assigned" means that the task should be completed soon.

      • setDone

        public void setDone()
        Sets the status of a task to "Done", which indicates that the task has been completed.

      • getStatus

        public java.lang.String getStatus()
        Returns the current status of the task.
        Returns:
        a string representing the status of the task

      • getRequester

        public java.lang.String getRequester()
        Returns the requester of a particular task.
        Returns:
        a string representing the name of the user that has requested the task
